introduction.name: I'm Emanuel Casco
introduction.presentation: <paragraph>Currently working on <link1>Waterplan Inc</link1> as Software Engineer.</paragraph> <paragraph>I write occasionally about topics like frontend, backend, and so more. If you find something interesting, please don't doubt to share it!</paragraph><paragraph>If you'd like to get in touch with me, you can do it by any of my social networks (but probably my <link2>email</link2> would be the better option).</paragraph>
